<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\file Implements a module splitting algorithm designed to support the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">/// FullLTO --lto-partitions option for parallel codegen.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The role of this module splitting pass is the same as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">/// lib/Transforms/Utils/SplitModule.cpp: load-balance the module&#39;s functions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">/// across a set of N partitions to allow for parallel codegen.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The similarities mostly end here, as this pass achieves load-balancing in a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">/// more elaborate fashion which is targeted towards AMDGPU modules. It can take</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">/// advantage of the structure of AMDGPU modules (which are mostly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">/// self-contained) to allow for more efficient splitting without affecting</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// codegen negatively, or causing innaccurate resource usage analysis.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// High-level pass overview:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">///   - SplitGraph &amp; associated classes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">///      - Graph representation of the module and of the dependencies that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">///      matter for splitting.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">///   - RecursiveSearchSplitting</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///     - Core splitting algorithm.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">///   - SplitProposal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">///     - Represents a suggested solution for splitting the input module. These</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">///     solutions can be scored to determine the best one when multiple</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">///     solutions are available.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">///   - Driver/pass &quot;run&quot; function glues everything together.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpusplitmodule-h">AMDGPUSplitModule.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a2ffb58efadf5885f67a4ecd791d2b218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a2ffb58efadf5885f67a4ecd791d2b218">formatRatioOf</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> Num, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> Dem) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> DemOr1 = Dem ? Dem : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;%0.2f&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Num) / DemOr1) &#42; 100);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Checks whether a given function is non-copyable.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Non-copyable functions cannot be cloned into multiple partitions, and only</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">/// one copy of the function can be present across all partitions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Kernel functions and external functions fall into this category. If we were</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to clone them, we would end up with multiple symbol definitions and a very</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">/// unhappy linker.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Graph-based Module Representation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="comment">/// AMDGPUSplitModule&#39;s view of the source Module, as a graph of all components</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that can be split into different modules.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The most trivial instance of this graph is just the CallGraph of the module,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">/// but it is not guaranteed that the graph is strictly equal to the CG. It</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">/// currently always is but it&#39;s designed in a way that would eventually allow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment">/// us to create abstract nodes, or nodes for different entities such as global</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="comment">/// variables or any other meaningful constraint we must consider.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The graph is only mutable by this class, and is generally not modified</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="comment">/// after \\ref SplitGraph::buildGraph runs. No consumers of the graph can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="comment">/// mutate it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#a316867ec07c9150dfb4e4918b7af69a9">SplitGraph</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node">Node</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9">EdgeKind</a> : uint8&#95;t &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The nodes are related through a direct call. This is a &quot;strong&quot; edge as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// it means the Src will directly reference the Dst.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9af8d0d4845b0b074d9f2e0f2ace6683da"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9af8d0d4845b0b074d9f2e0f2ace6683da">DirectCall</a>,</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The nodes are related through an indirect call.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// This is a &quot;weaker&quot; edge and is only considered when traversing the graph</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// starting from a kernel. We need this edge for resource usage analysis.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The reason why we have this edge in the first place is due to how</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// AMDGPUResourceUsageAnalysis works. In the presence of an indirect call,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// the resource usage of the kernel containing the indirect call is the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// max resource usage of all functions that can be indirectly called.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9a9c73278820c265864adec96a189ba744"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9a9c73278820c265864adec96a189ba744">IndirectCall</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// An edge between two nodes. Edges are directional, and tagged with a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &quot;kind&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specificbumpptrallocator">SpecificBumpPtrAllocator&lt;Node&gt;</a> NodesPool;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Edges are trivially destructible objects, so as a small optimization we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// use a BumpPtrAllocator which avoids destructor calls but also makes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allocation faster.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::is&#95;trivially&#95;destructible&#95;v&lt;Edge&gt;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Edge must be trivially destructible to use the BumpPtrAllocator&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> EdgesPool;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Nodes in the SplitGraph contain both incoming, and outgoing edges.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Incoming edges have this node as their Dst, and Outgoing ones have this node</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="comment">/// as their Src.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Edge objects are shared by both nodes in Src/Dst. They provide immediate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="comment">/// feedback on how two nodes are related, and in which direction they are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="comment">/// related, which is valuable information to make splitting decisions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Nodes are fundamentally abstract, and any consumers of the graph should</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="comment">/// treat them as such. While a node will be a function most of the time, we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="comment">/// could also create nodes for any other reason. In the future, we could have</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="comment">/// single nodes for multiple functions, or nodes for GVs, etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node">SplitGraph::Node</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node/#ab8ea3e9164803ba3b6b59fab949bd0f3"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">friend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node/#ab8ea3e9164803ba3b6b59fab949bd0f3">SplitGraph</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Represents a module splitting proposal.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Proposals are made of N BitVectors, one for each partition, where each bit</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="comment">/// set indicates that the node is present and should be copied inside that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="comment">/// partition.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Proposals have several metrics attached so they can be compared/sorted,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="comment">/// which the driver to try multiple strategies resultings in multiple proposals</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and choose the best one out of them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a5260eb179c3a6fda24345ae0e6740556">SplitProposal</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a5260eb179c3a6fda24345ae0e6740556"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a5260eb179c3a6fda24345ae0e6740556">SplitProposal</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph">SplitGraph</a> &amp;SG, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxPartitions) : SG(&amp;SG) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><Highlight kind="normal">    Partitions.resize(MaxPartitions, &#123;0, SG.createNodesBitVector()&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a98f31ddf4352a17257ff914f32ddbd02"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a98f31ddf4352a17257ff914f32ddbd02">setName</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> NewName) &#123; Name = NewName; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#aa6aa5f53b7b30135cb3afbcf4e223091"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#aa6aa5f53b7b30135cb3afbcf4e223091">getName</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Name; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a5836550f3b15be3dbc6d707dd8c2de45"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a5836550f3b15be3dbc6d707dd8c2de45">operator&#91;&#93;</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PID)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#ac598f5cbb000dbdd8adbf94cb2242e1a"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#ac598f5cbb000dbdd8adbf94cb2242e1a">add</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PID, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp;BV) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a843229cfda9f61491b29bbf045507f4d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#aa863693eef567397d9c292da5bf22d34">LLVM&#95;DUMP&#95;METHOD</a> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a843229cfda9f61491b29bbf045507f4d">dump</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/archivewriter-cpp/#aa9f638c7ae7fdd206a6c60e26bef9751">print</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the cheapest partition (lowest cost). In case of ties, always returns</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the highest partition number.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> findCheapestPartition() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Calculate the CodeSize and Bottleneck scores.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> calculateScores();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> verifyCompleteness() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Only available after \\ref calculateScores is called.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A positive number indicating the % of code duplication that this proposal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// creates. e.g. 0.2 means this proposal adds roughly 20% code size by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// duplicating some functions across partitions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Value is always rounded up to 3 decimal places.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A perfect score would be 0.0, and anything approaching 1 is very bad.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a2b814b24fd11bbfc3ffc4f289c8cd36b"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a2b814b24fd11bbfc3ffc4f289c8cd36b">getCodeSizeScore</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CodeSizeScore; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Only available after \\ref calculateScores is called.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A number between &#91;0, 1&#93; which indicates how big of a bottleneck is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// expected from the largest partition.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A score of 1 means the biggest partition is as big as the source module,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// so build time will be equal to or greater than the build time of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// initial input.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Value is always rounded up to 3 decimal places.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is one of the metrics used to estimate this proposal&#39;s build time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a8b7f24ee69de158b68769c29464e6b1c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a8b7f24ee69de158b68769c29464e6b1c">getBottleneckScore</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BottleneckScore; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> updateScore(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PID) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;PCost, Nodes&#93; : Partitions) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><Highlight kind="normal">      TotalCost -= PCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><Highlight kind="normal">      PCost = SG-&gt;calculateCost(Nodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><Highlight kind="normal">      TotalCost += PCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\see getCodeSizeScore</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CodeSizeScore = 0.0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\see getBottleneckScore</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BottleneckScore = 0.0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Aggregated cost of all partitions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><Highlight kind="normal">  CostType TotalCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SplitGraph &#42;SG = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string Name;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;std::pair&lt;CostType, BitVector&gt;&gt; Partitions;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a0215de52344b43a21c90bb5e2293a5fb"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a0215de52344b43a21c90bb5e2293a5fb">SplitProposal::print</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><Highlight kind="normal">  OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#91;proposal&#93; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Name &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, total cost:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; TotalCost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><Highlight kind="normal">     &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, code size score:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;%0.3f&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, CodeSizeScore)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><Highlight kind="normal">     &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, bottleneck score:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;%0.3f&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, BottleneckScore) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;PID, Part&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Partitions)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>, NodeIDs&#93; = Part;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;  - P&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; PID &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; nodes:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; NodeIDs.count() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; cost: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><Highlight kind="normal">       &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;|&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a2ffb58efadf5885f67a4ecd791d2b218">formatRatioOf</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>, SG-&gt;getModuleCost()) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;%\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a2c57a3c3b97578adb6ee510485e6eb47"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a2c57a3c3b97578adb6ee510485e6eb47">SplitProposal::findCheapestPartition</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Partitions.empty());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> CurCost = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;CostType&gt;::max();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurPID = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;Idx, Part&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Partitions)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Part.first &lt;= CurCost) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurPID = Idx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurCost = Part.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CurPID != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurPID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a7b2732b0f1d325de354b9a80d03768c3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a7b2732b0f1d325de354b9a80d03768c3">SplitProposal::calculateScores</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Partitions.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> LargestPCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;PCost, Nodes&#93; : Partitions) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PCost &gt; LargestPCost)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><Highlight kind="normal">      LargestPCost = PCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> ModuleCost = SG-&gt;getModuleCost();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><Highlight kind="normal">  CodeSizeScore = double(TotalCost) / ModuleCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CodeSizeScore &gt;= 0.0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><Highlight kind="normal">  BottleneckScore = double(LargestPCost) / ModuleCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="normal">  CodeSizeScore = std::ceil(CodeSizeScore &#42; 100.0) / 100.0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="normal">  BottleneckScore = std::ceil(BottleneckScore &#42; 100.0) / 100.0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Partitions.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===-- RecursiveSearchStrategy -------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Partitioning algorithm.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is a recursive search algorithm that can explore multiple possiblities.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="comment">/// When a cluster of nodes can go into more than one partition, and we haven&#39;t</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="comment">/// reached maximum search depth, we recurse and explore both options and their</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="comment">/// consequences. Both branches will yield a proposal, and the driver will grade</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="comment">/// both and choose the best one.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If max depth is reached, we will use some heuristics to make a choice. Most</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of the time we will just use the least-pressured (cheapest) partition, but</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if a cluster is particularly big and there is a good amount of overlap with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="comment">/// an existing partition, we will choose that partition instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a7730964440282e892cf5d22604f49507">RecursiveSearchSplitting</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a8eaf74ac38a942f1ca6e2307d38467cd"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a8eaf74ac38a942f1ca6e2307d38467cd">SubmitProposalFn</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;void(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal">SplitProposal</a>)&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a7730964440282e892cf5d22604f49507">RecursiveSearchSplitting</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph">SplitGraph</a> &amp;SG, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumParts,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a8eaf74ac38a942f1ca6e2307d38467cd">SubmitProposalFn</a> SubmitProposal);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Collects all graph entry points&#39;s clusters and sort them so the most</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// expensive clusters are viewed first. This will merge clusters together if</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Recursive function that assigns the worklist item at \\p Idx into a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// partition of \\p SP.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p Depth is the current search depth. When this value is equal to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\ref MaxDepth, we can no longer recurse.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This function only recurses if there is more than one possible assignment,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// otherwise it is iterative to avoid creating a call stack that is as big as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\ref WorkList.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> pickPartition(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx, SplitProposal SP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return A pair: first element is the PID of the partition that has the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// most similarities with \\p Entry, or \\ref InvalidPID if no partition was</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// found with at least one element in common. The second element is the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// aggregated cost of all dependencies in common between \\p Entry and that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// partition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;unsigned, CostType&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// e.g. if A and B are two worklist item, and they both call a non copyable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dependency C, this does:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    B=C</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// =&gt; NodeEC will create a single group (A, B, C) and we create a new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// WorkList entry for that group.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node">SplitGraph::Node</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : SG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#a8fcde5bd7cc93492f3b81908846cff7b">nodes</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;isGraphEntryPoint())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeID : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.Cluster.set&#95;bits())</Highlight></CodeLine>
