<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RecursiveSearchSplitting::pickPartition(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal">SplitProposal</a> SP) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Idx &lt; WorkList.size()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Step 1: Determine candidate PIDs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WorkListEntry &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a> = WorkList&#91;Idx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitVector &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptx/#abd325b49b8e2f00c0370b1c68cf51557a2f28817471f8380496f40c1c375c4e56">Cluster</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.Cluster;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Default option is to do load-balancing, AKA assign to least pressured</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// partition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CheapestPID = SP.findCheapestPartition();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CheapestPID != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Explore assigning to the kernel that contains the most dependencies in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// common.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;MostSimilarPID, SimilarDepsCost&#93; =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><Highlight kind="normal">        findMostSimilarPartition(Entry, SP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can chose to explore only one path if we only have one valid path, or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if we reached maximum search depth and can no longer branch out.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SinglePIDToTry = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MostSimilarPID == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>) </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// no similar PID found</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><Highlight kind="normal">      SinglePIDToTry = CheapestPID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MostSimilarPID == CheapestPID) </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// both landed on the same PID</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><Highlight kind="normal">      SinglePIDToTry = CheapestPID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a02273768ec41f48168b8b464f639bcd3">MaxDepth</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have to choose one path. Use a heuristic to guess which one will be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// more appropriate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.CostExcludingGraphEntryPoints &gt; LargeClusterThreshold) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the amount of code in common makes it worth it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SimilarDepsCost &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.CostExcludingGraphEntryPoints);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ratio = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(SimilarDepsCost) /</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.CostExcludingGraphEntryPoints;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Ratio &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; Ratio &lt;= 1.0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ratio &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a48d50e56a2dbc8c6f77083f912605294">LargeFnOverlapForMerge</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For debug, just print &quot;L&quot;, so we&#39;ll see &quot;L3=P3&quot; for instance, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will mean we reached max depth and chose P3 based on this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// heuristic.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;L&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><Highlight kind="normal">          SinglePIDToTry = MostSimilarPID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><Highlight kind="normal">        SinglePIDToTry = CheapestPID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Step 2: Explore candidates.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When we only explore one possible path, and thus branch depth doesn&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// increase, do not recurse, iterate instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SinglePIDToTry != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; Idx &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;=P&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; SinglePIDToTry &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39; &#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only one path to explore, don&#39;t clone SP, don&#39;t increase depth.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><Highlight kind="normal">      SP.add(SinglePIDToTry, Cluster);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++Idx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(MostSimilarPID != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We explore multiple paths: recurse at increased depth, then stop this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lb = load balancing = put in cheapest partition</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><Highlight kind="normal">      SplitProposal BranchSP = SP;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().indent(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><Highlight kind="normal">                 &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &#91;lb&#93; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Idx &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;=P&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; CheapestPID &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;? &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><Highlight kind="normal">      BranchSP.add(CheapestPID, Cluster);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><Highlight kind="normal">      pickPartition(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> + 1, Idx + 1, BranchSP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ms = most similar = put in partition with the most in common</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><Highlight kind="normal">      SplitProposal BranchSP = SP;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().indent(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><Highlight kind="normal">                 &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &#91;ms&#93; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Idx &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;=P&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; MostSimilarPID &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;? &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><Highlight kind="normal">      BranchSP.add(MostSimilarPID, Cluster);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><Highlight kind="normal">      pickPartition(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> + 1, Idx + 1, BranchSP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Step 3: If we assigned all WorkList items, submit the proposal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Idx == WorkList.size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumProposalsSubmitted &lt;= (2u &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a02273768ec41f48168b8b464f639bcd3">MaxDepth</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Search got out of bounds?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><Highlight kind="normal">  SP.setName(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;recursive&#95;search (depth=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> + std::to&#95;string(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>) + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;) #&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><Highlight kind="normal">             std::to&#95;string(NumProposalsSubmitted++));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><Highlight kind="normal">  SubmitProposal(SP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;unsigned, CostType&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><Highlight kind="normal">RecursiveSearchSplitting::findMostSimilarPartition(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WorkListEntry &amp;Entry,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal">SplitProposal</a> &amp;SP) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.NumNonEntryNodes)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>, 0&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We take the partition that is the most similar using Cost as a metric.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// So we take the set of nodes in common, compute their aggregated cost, and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pick the partition with the highest cost in common.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChosenPID = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> ChosenCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PID = 0; PID &lt; NumParts; ++PID) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><Highlight kind="normal">    BitVector BV = SP&#91;PID&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><Highlight kind="normal">    BV &amp;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.Cluster; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: &amp; doesn&#39;t work between BVs?!</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BV.none())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = SG.calculateCost(BV);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ChosenPID == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a> || ChosenCost &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><Highlight kind="normal">        (ChosenCost == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &amp;&amp; PID &gt; ChosenPID)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><Highlight kind="normal">      ChosenPID = PID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><Highlight kind="normal">      ChosenCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;ChosenPID, ChosenCost&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#aa45ff7fccb3b682c54c9051e2c74705d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node">SplitGraph::Node</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#aa45ff7fccb3b682c54c9051e2c74705d">mapEdgeToDst</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/edge">SplitGraph::Edge</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>-&gt;Dst;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a37d07b3d937c118303cb6668c9605093"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a37d07b3d937c118303cb6668c9605093">SplitGraphEdgeDstIterator</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapped-iterator">mapped&#95;iterator</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#a4678598cfb6250c999f0aeb17565ed42">SplitGraph::edges&#95;iterator</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">decltype</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#aa45ff7fccb3b682c54c9051e2c74705d">mapEdgeToDst</a>)&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraph">CallGraph</a> CG(M);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Externalize functions whose address are taken.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is needed because partitioning is purely based on calls, but sometimes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a kernel/function may just look at the address of another local function</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and not do anything (no calls). After partitioning, that local function may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end up in a different module (so it&#39;s just a declaration in the module</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// where its address is taken), which emits a &quot;undefined hidden symbol&quot; linker</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// error.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Additionally, it guides partitioning to not duplicate this function if it&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// called directly at some point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Could we be smarter about this ? This makes all functions whose</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// addresses are taken non-copyable. We should probably model this type of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constraint in the graph and use it to guide splitting, instead of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// externalizing like this. Maybe non-copyable should really mean &quot;keep one</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// visible copy, then internalize all other copies&quot; for some functions?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#aa08ecbf5df71f6c94b76cf8d745df92d">NoExternalizeOnAddrTaken</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Fn : M) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Should aliases count? Probably not but they&#39;re so rare I&#39;m not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sure it&#39;s worth fixing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Fn.hasLocalLinkage() &amp;&amp; Fn.hasAddressTaken()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
